verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass in those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that there went <S%G1831><s%> out a decree <S%G1378><s%> from Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Augustus <S%G828><s%>that all <S%G3956><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> should be taxed. <S%G582><s%>
(And this <S%G3778><s%> taxing <S%G583><s%> was first <S%G4413><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> when Cyrenius <S%G2958><s%> was governor <S%G2230><s%> of Syria. <S%G4947><s%>)
And all <S%G3956><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to be taxed, <S%G582><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one into <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> city. <S%G4172><s%>

And Joseph <S%G2501><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up from Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> out of the city <S%G4172><s%> of Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> to the city <S%G4172><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Bethlehem; <S%G965><s%> (because <S%G1223><s%> he was of the house <S%G3624><s%> and lineage <S%G3965><s%> of David: <S%G1138><s%>)
To be taxed <S%G582><s%> with Mary <S%G3137><s%> his espoused <S%G3423><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> great with child. <S%G1471><s%>
And so it was, that, while they were there, <S%G1563><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> were accomplished <S%G4130><s%> that she should be delivered. <S%G5088><s%>

And she brought <S%G5088><s%> forth <S%G5088><s%> her firstborn <S%G4416><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> and wrapped <S%G4683><s%> him in swaddling <S%G4683><s%> clothes, <S%G4683><s%> and laid <S%G347><s%> him in a manger; <S%G5336><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> there was no <S%G3756><s%> room <S%G5117><s%> for them in the inn. <S%G2646><s%>

And there were in the same <S%G846><s%> country <S%G5561><s%> shepherds <S%G4166><s%> abiding <S%G63><s%> in the field, <S%G68><s%> keeping <S%G5442><s%> watch <S%G5438><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> their flock <S%G4167><s%> by night. <S%G3571><s%>

And, see, <S%G2400><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> came <S%G2186><s%> on them, and the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> shone <S%G4034><s%> round <S%G4034><s%> about <S%G4034><s%> them: and they were sore <S%G3173><s%> afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

And the angel <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Fear <S%G5399><s%> not: for, behold, <S%G2400><s%> I bring <S%G2097><s%> you good <S%G2097><s%> tidings <S%G2097><s%> of great <S%G3173><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall be to all <S%G3956><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

For to you is born <S%G5088><s%> this <S%G4594><s%> day <S%G4594><s%> in the city <S%G4172><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> a Savior, <S%G4990><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is Christ <S%G5547><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> shall be a sign <S%G4592><s%> to you; You shall find <S%G2147><s%> the babe <S%G1025><s%> wrapped <S%G4683><s%> in swaddling <S%G4683><s%> clothes, <S%G4683><s%> lying <S%G2749><s%> in a manger. <S%G5336><s%>

And suddenly <S%G1810><s%> there was with the angel <S%G32><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the heavenly <S%G3770><s%> host <S%G4756><s%> praising <S%G134><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Glory <S%G1391><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> in the highest, <S%G5310><s%> and on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> good <S%G2107><s%> will <S%G2107><s%> toward <S%G1722><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as the angels <S%G32><s%> were gone <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> from them into <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> the shepherds <S%G4166><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> Let us now <S%G1211><s%> go <S%G1330><s%> even to Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> and see <S%G1492><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thing <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, which <S%G3588><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to us.
And they came <S%G2064><s%> with haste, <S%G4692><s%> and found <S%G429><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> and Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> and the babe <S%G1025><s%> lying <S%G2749><s%> in a manger. <S%G5336><s%>

And when they had seen <S%G1492><s%> it, they made <S%G1232><s%> known <S%G1232><s%> abroad <S%G1232><s%> the saying <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was told <S%G2980><s%> them concerning <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> child. <S%G3813><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> they that heard <S%G191><s%> it wondered <S%G2296><s%> at <S%G4012><s%> those things which <S%G3588><s%> were told <S%G2980><s%> them by the shepherds. <S%G4166><s%>
But Mary <S%G3137><s%> kept <S%G4933><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, <S%G4487><s%> and pondered <S%G4820><s%> them in her heart. <S%G2588><s%>

And the shepherds <S%G4166><s%> returned, <S%G1994><s%> glorifying <S%G1392><s%> and praising <S%G134><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the things that they had heard <S%G191><s%> and seen, <S%G1492><s%> as it was told <S%G2980><s%> to them.

And when <S%G3753><s%> eight <S%G3638><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> were accomplished <S%G4130><s%> for the circumcising <S%G4059><s%> of the child, <S%G3813><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> was called <S%G2564><s%> JESUS, <S%G2424><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was so named <S%G2564><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> he was conceived <S%G4815><s%> in the womb. <S%G2836><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of her purification <S%G2512><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> were accomplished, <S%G4130><s%> they brought <S%G321><s%> him to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> to present <S%G3936><s%> him to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

(As it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> of the LORD, <S%G2962><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> male <S%G730><s%> that opens <S%G1272><s%> the womb <S%G3388><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> to the Lord; <S%G2962><s%>)

And to offer <S%G1325><s%> a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to that which is said <S%G2046><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> A pair <S%G2201><s%> of turtledoves, <S%G5167><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> young <S%G3502><s%> pigeons. <S%G4058><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was a man <S%G444><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Simeon; <S%G4826><s%> and the same <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was just <S%G1342><s%> and devout, <S%G2126><s%> waiting <S%G4327><s%> for the consolation <S%G3874><s%> of Israel: <S%G2474><s%> and the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> was on him.

And it was revealed <S%G5537><s%> to him by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> that he should not see <S%G1492><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> <S%G2228><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And he came <S%G2064><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple: <S%G2411><s%> and when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> the parents <S%G1118><s%> brought <S%G1521><s%> in the child <S%G3813><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> for him after <S%G2596><s%> the custom <S%G1480><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%>
Then <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G1209><s%> he him up in his arms, <S%G43><s%> and blessed <S%G2127><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%>
Lord, <S%G1203><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> let <S%G630><s%> you your servant <S%G1401><s%> depart <S%G630><s%> in peace, <S%G1515><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to your word: <S%G4487><s%>
For my <S%G3450><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> have seen <S%G1492><s%> your salvation, <S%G4992><s%>
Which <S%G3739><s%> you have prepared <S%G2090><s%> before <S%G2596><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> people; <S%G2992><s%>
A light <S%G5457><s%> to lighten <S%G602><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and the glory <S%G1391><s%> of your people <S%G2992><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
And Joseph <S%G2501><s%> and his mother <S%G3384><s%> marveled <S%G2296><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> things which were spoken <S%G2980><s%> of him.

And Simeon <S%G4826><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> them, and said <S%G2036><s%> to Mary <S%G3137><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> child is set <S%G2749><s%> for the fall <S%G4431><s%> and rising <S%G386><s%> again <S%G386><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> in Israel; <S%G2474><s%> and for a sign <S%G4592><s%> which shall be spoken <S%G483><s%> against; <S%G483><s%>

(Yes, <S%G1161><s%> a sword <S%G4501><s%> shall pierce <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1330><s%> your own soul <S%G5590><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%>) that the thoughts <S%G1261><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> may be revealed. <S%G601><s%>

And there was one Anna, <S%G451><s%> a prophetess, <S%G4398><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Phanuel, <S%G5323><s%> of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Aser: <S%G768><s%> she was of a great <S%G4183><s%> age, <S%G2250><s%> and had lived <S%G2198><s%> with an husband <S%G435><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> from her virginity; <S%G3932><s%>

And she was a widow <S%G5503><s%> of about <S%G5613><s%> fourscore <S%G3589><s%> and four <S%G5064><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> departed <S%G868><s%> not from the temple, <S%G2411><s%> but served <S%G3000><s%> God with fastings <S%G3521><s%> and prayers <S%G1162><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and day. <S%G2250><s%>

And she coming <S%G2186><s%> in that instant <S%G5610><s%> gave <S%G437><s%> thanks <S%G437><s%> likewise <S%G437><s%> to the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and spoke <S%G2980><s%> of him to all <S%G3956><s%> them that looked <S%G4327><s%> for redemption <S%G3085><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

And when <S%G5613><s%> they had performed <S%G5055><s%> all <S%G537><s%> things according <S%G2596><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> they returned <S%G5290><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> to their own city <S%G4172><s%> Nazareth. <S%G3478><s%>

And the child <S%G3813><s%> grew, <S%G837><s%> and waxed <S%G2901><s%> strong <S%G2901><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> filled <S%G4137><s%> with wisdom: <S%G4678><s%> and the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was on him.
Now <S%G2532><s%> his parents <S%G1118><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> at the feast <S%G1859><s%> of the passover. <S%G3957><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> he was twelve <S%G1427><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> old, they went <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the custom <S%G1485><s%> of the feast. <S%G1859><s%>

And when they had fulfilled <S%G5048><s%> the days, <S%G2250><s%> as they returned, <S%G5290><s%> the child <S%G3816><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> tarried <S%G5278><s%> behind <S%G5278><s%> in Jerusalem; <S%G2419><s%> and Joseph <S%G2501><s%> and his mother <S%G3384><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> not of it.

But they, supposing <S%G3543><s%> him to have been <S%G1511><s%> in the company, <S%G4923><s%> went <S%G2064><s%> a day's <S%G2250><s%> journey; <S%G3598><s%> and they sought <S%G327><s%> him among <S%G1722><s%> their kinsfolk <S%G4773><s%> and acquaintance. <S%G1110><s%>
And when they found <S%G2147><s%> him not, they turned <S%G5290><s%> back <S%G5290><s%> again <S%G5290><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> they found <S%G2147><s%> him in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> sitting <S%G2516><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the doctors, <S%G1320><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> them, and asking <S%G1905><s%> them questions. <S%G1905><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> that heard <S%G191><s%> him were astonished <S%G1839><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his understanding <S%G4907><s%> and answers. <S%G612><s%>

And when they saw <S%G1492><s%> him, they were amazed: <S%G1605><s%> and his mother <S%G3384><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Son, <S%G5043><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> have you thus <S%G3779><s%> dealt <S%G4160><s%> with us? behold, <S%G2400><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and I have sought <S%G2212><s%> you sorrowing. <S%G3600><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, How <S%G5101><s%> is it that you sought <S%G2212><s%> me? knew <S%G1492><s%> you not that I must <S%G1163><s%> be about <S%G1722><s%> my Father's <S%G3962><s%> business?
And they understood <S%G4920><s%> not the saying <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them.

And he went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> with them, and came <S%G2064><s%> to Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> and was subject <S%G5293><s%> to them: but his mother <S%G3384><s%> kept <S%G1301><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> sayings <S%G4487><s%> in her heart. <S%G2588><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> increased <S%G4298><s%> in wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and stature, <S%G2244><s%> and in favor <S%G5485><s%> with God <S%G2316><s%> and man. <S%G444><s%>
